item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Order Settings > Gift options > EnableÂ Offer gift wrapping > Save Message “Update successful” appears Go to FO > Add a product to cart > Proceed to checkout until step 3 - Shipping method Option “I would like my order to be gift wrapped” appears Check option “I would like my order to be gift wrapped” a new field appears “If you’d like, you can add a note to the gift:” Add a note > Continue the checkout process > Place order The order is now confirmed Go to BO > Orders > Orders > View latest order > Open Carrier tab and see your message In Carrier tab, the note is displayed
